title: Bronze sup wanting to get out of hell. LF team or duo ^_^
body:
1 month into LoL ranked, and playing support is my thing (adc/jug secondary), and would love to get out of this rank of abuse. Still learning the finer points of the game (which is hard in this division), but have good awareness and can play my mains proficiently. Can also admit when I'm wrong and learn from mistakes. Sick of being stuck with either advanced players who abuse everyone, or people who have no clue at all.

Have played many other games competitively, and just want to get better while playing harder teams, and have fun. Unfortunately the rl friends I have that play, are gold/plat and don't really wanna tank down in bronze.

Don't rage, very chill

Peace

replies.body: I play {{champion:122}} top and {{champion:107}} jungle add me if your interested
Yup. I'm an adc main so if you want to have a few norms first to see if we gel well :P

Nice one man. Im on after work every day, till late at night usually, hit me up

nubcone
Hey! I'd be real keen to duo with you, stuck in bronze as well. Can duo botlane!

Nice one man. Im on after work every day, till late at night usually, hit me up

nubcone
